perturbation.original_text: 1.3 No Protected Territory. You expressly acknowledge and agree that this franchise is non-exclusive, and that this Agreement does not grant or imply any protected area or territory for the Franchised Business. Accordingly, we retain the right to conduct any business and sell Page 2 of 80 services and products at any location, notwithstanding the proximity of that business activity to the Approved Location.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3 No Protected Territory. You expressly acknowledge and agree that this franchise includes a protected territory. Accordingly, we will not conduct any business and sell Page 2 of 80 services and products at any location within a radius of 5 miles from your Approved Location.
perturbation.explanation: This change directly contradicts the original text by establishing a protected territory when the original stated the franchise was non-exclusive and had no protected territory. This creates uncertainty about where the franchisee has exclusive rights to operate.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1.3 Your Franchised Business will offer for sale only such insurance products and Services that conform to our specifications and quality standards and only through insurance carriers that we make available to you through our appointment process ("Approved Products and Services").
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1.3 Your Franchised Business will offer for sale any insurance products and Services, regardless of whether they conform to our specifications and quality standards, and from any insurance carriers, whether or not we have made them available to you through our appointment process ("Approved Products and Services").
perturbation.explanation: The original text restricted the products and services to those approved and available through the franchisor. The change allows the franchisee to offer any products and services from any carrier, directly contradicting the original restriction and creating uncertainty about what products and carriers are permitted.

perturbation.original_text: 18.5 Our Option to Buy Your Assets. Within thirty (30) days after expiration or non-renewal under this Agreement and/or default under your lease/sublease for the premises, we shall buy from you (and/or your affiliates) all assets of the Franchised Business.
perturbation.changed_text: 18.5 Our Option to Buy Your Assets. Within thirty (30) days after expiration or non-renewal under this Agreement and/or default under your lease/sublease for the premises, we may, at our sole discretion, buy from you (and/or your affiliates) any or none of the assets of the Franchised Business.
perturbation.explanation: The original text made the purchase of assets by the franchisor mandatory upon expiration or termination. The modified text makes the purchase optional, directly contradicting the prior obligation and creating uncertainty about whether the franchisor will purchase the assets upon termination.
